--create EXTERNAL data SOURCE nyc_taxi_data_raw

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv',
        DATA_source = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW= TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
---getting data from more that one file 

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv','trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=05/*.csv'),

        DATA_source = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW= TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]

    ----just using wild cards

    SELECT
    TOP 100 filename,*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/**',
        DATA_source = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW= TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]

    ------more than 1 wildcard with filename and filepath

SELECT top 10000
result.filename() as 'filename',
    result.*
FROm
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_source = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW= TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]

    ------count files by filenames 

    
    SELECT 
    result.filename() as 'filename',
    count(1) as 'filecount'
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/**',
        DATA_source = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW= TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
    group by  result.filename()
    order  by  result.filename() ASC

    -----Add a where clouse to the file name 

    SELECT 
    result.filename() as 'filename',
    count(1) as 'filecount'
    FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/**',
        DATA_source = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW= TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
    where result.filename() in ('green_tripdata_2021-03.csv','green_tripdata_2020-02.csv')
    group by  result.filename()
    order  by  result.filename() ASC

    --woorking  with file path 

    SELECT 
    result.filename() as 'filename',
    result.filepath() as 'filepath',
    count(1) as 'filecount'
    FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/**',
        DATA_source = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW= TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
   -- where result.filename() in ('green_tripdata_2021-03.csv','green_tripdata_2020-02.csv')
    group by  result.filename(), result.filepath() 
    order  by  result.filename() ASC

    ---file path with parameters (you can also add where clouse )
 SELECT 
   
    result.filepath(1) as 'file_year',
    result.filepath(2) as 'file_month',
    count(1) as 'filecount'
    FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_source = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW= TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
    where result.filepath(1) ='2021' and result.filepath(2) in ('02','03','04','05','06')
    group by   result.filepath(1) , result.filepath(2)
